name: Stone
description: Basic material that forms the earth's crust. Essential for primitive tools.

name: Wood
description: Natural material obtained from trees. Used for fuel and basic construction.

name: Raw Meat
description: Meat obtained from hunting animals. Can be eaten after cooking.

name: Animal Hide
description: Leather from hunted animals. Used for clothing and shelter.

name: Bone
description: Hard material from animals. Used for tools and weapons.

name: Flint
description: A hard stone that produces sparks. Used for making fire.

name: Plant Fiber
description: Fibers from plants. Used for making rope and simple textiles.

name: Clay
description: Soil composed of fine particles. Raw material for pottery.

name: Reed
description: A tall grass that grows near water. Used for weaving.

name: Shell
description: Hard outer covering of marine animals. Used for decoration and tools.

name: Obsidian
description: Volcanic glass with sharp edges. Used for cutting tools.

name: Charcoal
description: Burned wood used as fuel. Burns hotter and longer than wood.

name: Stone Axe
description: A basic tool made of stone and wood. Used for cutting.

name: Stone Spear
description: A weapon made of stone and wood. Used for hunting.

name: Stone Knife
description: A sharp tool made of flint. Used for cutting and skinning.

name: Stone Hammer
description: A tool for breaking and shaping stone.

name: Stone Arrowhead
description: A sharp point for arrows. Used for hunting.

name: Hand Drill
description: A simple tool for making fire by friction.

name: Leather Pouch
description: A container made from animal hide.

name: Grass Basket
description: A container woven from grass or reeds.

name: Stone Pot
description: A container made from carved stone.

name: Animal Fat
description: Grease from animals. Used for cooking and lighting.

name: Resin
description: Sticky substance from trees. Used as adhesive.

name: Feather
description: Light material from birds. Used for arrows and decoration.

name: Sinew
description: Strong fiber from animal tendons. Used for binding.

name: Stone Mortar
description: A bowl for grinding food and materials.

name: Stone Pestle
description: A tool for grinding in a mortar.

name: Fire
description: The controlled use of combustion. Provides light

name: Smoke
description: The byproduct of fire. Used for signaling and food preservation.

name: Ash
description: Residue from burned materials. Used for various purposes.

name: Water
description: The source of life. Essential for survival.

name: Wild Berries
description: Edible fruits found in nature.

name: Wild Nuts
description: Edible seeds found in nature.

name: Wild Roots
description: Edible underground plant parts.

name: Wild Herbs
description: Plants used for flavoring and medicine.

name: Stone Arrow
description: A projectile weapon made of stone and wood.

name: Stone Club
description: A simple weapon made of a heavy stone.

name: Leather Clothing
description: Basic clothing made from animal hide.

name: Grass Mat
description: A mat woven from grass. Used for sleeping.

name: Animal Skull
description: A decorative item from hunted animals.

name: Stone Bead
description: A decorative item made from stone.

name: Shell Necklace
description: A decorative item made from shells.

name: Stone Figurine
description: A small sculpture made from stone.

name: Cave Painting
description: Art made on cave walls using natural pigments.

name: Animal Call
description: A tool for imitating animal sounds during hunting.

name: Stone Trap
description: A device for catching animals.

name: Fire Pit
description: A designated area for maintaining fire.

name: Stone Shelter
description: A basic structure made from stones.

name: Grass Roof
description: A roof made from woven grass.

name: Stone Marker
description: A marker made from stone. Used for navigation.
